title: midi.out
description: The `midi.out` object sends MIDI messages to an external MIDI device, converting "cooked" MIDI data (e.g., `ctl`, `note`, `pgm`) into raw MIDI bytes. Unlike `midiout`, it handles various MIDI message types directly. It can also output raw MIDI data to its outlet, optionally exclusively via the `-ext` flag or `ext` message.
